short_summary: Invitation to tender 01B46-22-126 Maintenance of elevating devices at the Central Experimental Farm
description: Invitation to tender 01B46-22-126 Maintenance of elevating devices at the Central Experimental Farm Des soumissions pour le projet identifié en rubrique, seront reçues jusqu'à la date et l'heure indiquées ci-dessous, à l'adresse suivante: aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.caScope of Work:Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) requires service and maintenance of its elevating devices at the Central Experimental Farm (CEF) location. CEF has eighteen (18) elevating devices, under this requirement, and they are located in different buildings throughout the Farm’s property(Optional Site Visit:It is recommended that the Bidder or a representative of the Bidder visit the work site.
